content: {"name": "Congreso de Latinos Unidos", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Remote and in-person services are offered at preference of client and by appointment\n* Project Hope is NY's COVID-19 Emotional Support Helpline. Their Crisis Counselors are trained, knowledgeable, never judgmental, and they understand what you are going through. Talking to them is free, confidential, and anonymous.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.congreso.net/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "216 West Somerset Street", "address_2": null, "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19133", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9928854, "longitude": -75.1354291}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 763-8870", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must be income-eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Helps with income, rent, utility and food stamps"}]}
